result.title: Doubt in DP problem Dima and Salad (CF 366C)
result.content:
Hello everyone. I was doing the problem Dima and Salad http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/366/C and this is the recursive memoized solution that I came up with

rec(int tasteNow, int caloriesNow, int index)

so from here we can go to index+1 choosing fruit at index or index+1 without choosing fruit at index

 static int rec(int tasteNow, int caloriesNow, int index)    // will return maximum taste among all permissible 
	  {
		  int rem = 0;
		  int quo = 0;
		  if (caloriesNow > 0){
			  rem = tasteNow%caloriesNow;
		  	  quo = tasteNow/caloriesNow;
		  }
		  
		  if (rem == 0 && quo == k)
			  dptaste[index] = Math.max(dptaste[index], tasteNow);
		  
		  if (index >= n)
			  return 0;
		  if (dptaste[index] != -1)
			  return dptaste[index];
		  
		  int res = 0;
		  res =  Math.max(res, Math.max(rec(tasteNow+taste[index], caloriesNow+calories[index], index+1), rec(tasteNow, caloriesNow, index+1)));
		  
		  dptaste[index] = Math.max(dptaste[index], res);
		  return dptaste[index];
		  
		  
		  
	  }

Can someone tell me what is wrong with my approach and how I can modify it to get the correct solution. Thanks
